start:
I give you peace
Welcome to the Telegram Quran Reader bot. This bot is an ongoing charity for me and you.
I hope you will publish the bot
To see the source, send /repo 
to find out the command type /help A bot Made By @AsmSafone
help:
In this bot you can go to first page of Quran
 by sending: /open 
 You can open a specific page by submitting 
open page <page number>
